name: GAP (Ahamed Maahin)
description: This is a game which has been done by taking Reference from the YOUTUBE channel called BRACKEYS. It is named as GAP. It is a Team Project. The main objective of this game is the player has to ROTATE Green dot (Player Object) by using  'A' key or 'D' key (or) LEFT arrow key or RIGHT arrow key. The Hexagon which is presented in this game is the ENEMY element. If the player collides in it, the game will come to an END. The scoring process will be like till the player gets collided with the ENEMY the score will get INCREMENTED.  The SCORE can  be seen in the TOP LEFT CORNER side of the Game Screen. The player should not get COLLIDED with the HEXAGON to get the Score INCREMENTED. It is an ENDLESS game (The game goes on until the player gets out).
